name: Crispy Quest
description:
Crisp P Rat is taking his usual stroll through the sewer to meet his husband and son, Cheese Whiz and Peanut Butter, for a very romantic candle lit dinner. He is stopped by a very large and dirty Fatberg who happens to be in his way.  Crisp P Rat must go through obstacles to find the proper tools to give the Fatberg a bath so he can get to his family! 

Controls: W A S D to walk, Spacebar to jump, Q to pause 

Download Directions: Once the ZIP file is downloaded, unzip and open the folder. Click the .exe file and enjoy the game!
